    • Method Detail

      • setupCube

        private void setupCube()
        Creates the 3d array of RubiksPieces in a solved state of the RubiksCubes size.

      • setupRotation

        private void setupRotation()
        Sets up an array used for the rotating of layers.

      • rotateLayer

        public void rotateLayer(int direction,
                        int layer,
                        int amount)
        Calls the rotate methods properly with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        direction - Which direction will be turned (0 = FSB, 1 = UED, 2 = LMR).
        layer - How deep the layer to be turned is.
        amount - How many times to turn the layer.

      • rotateCube

        public void rotateCube(int direction,
                       int amount)
        Calls the rotate methods properly with the given parameters to rotate the entire cube.
        Parameters:
        direction - Which direction will be turned (0 = FSB, 1 = UED, 2 = LMR).
        amount - How many times to turn the cube.

      • rotateFSB

        private void rotateFSB(int layer)
        Properly rotates the FSB layers of the cube using the rotation array and the fixOrientation method
        Parameters:
        layer - How deep the layer to be turned is.

      • rotateUED

        private void rotateUED(int layer)
        Properly rotates the UED layers of the cube using the rotation array and the fixOrientation method
        Parameters:
        layer - How deep the layer to be turned is.

      • fixOrientation

        private int[] fixOrientation(int[] orientation,
                             int[][] orientationToSet)
        Corrects the given orientation.
        Parameters:
        orientation - The orientation of a RubiksPiece.
        orientationToSet - The orientations to be changed to specified different ones.
        Returns:
        The corrected orientation.
